body.p: This section describes how to perform some of the most common editing operations in .

section.title: Surround a Selection with an XML Element

section.title: Insert an Image

ol.li: Tap or click the Insert Image action on the toolbar.

Select the image from the file browsing dialog box that appears.If the image does not already exist in file structure of your repository, you can use the Upload File action at the top-right corner of the dialog box to upload it to the repository before selecting it.

section.p: You can also copy an image file from another document, web page, or application (such as a system file browser) and paste it into your document. will insert it as a reference to the image file.

section.title: Save a Modified XML Document
section.p: To save your changes, tap or click the Save button from the upper toolbar. Note that the save operation depends on the integration of the with a CMS or other storage mechanism.

section.title: Promote/Demote List Item Nodes
section.p:
In the desktop version of , you can easily promote or demote selected list item nodes within ordered lists or unordered lists by using the following keyboard shortcuts:
Promote ()
Promotes an entirely selected list item node to be a sibling of its parent node (the list item is moved to the left). It also works for selections of multiple list item nodes as long as all the selected nodes are siblings (on the same hierarchical level).
Demote ()
Demotes an entirely selected list item node (the list item is moved to the right). It also works for selections of multiple list item nodes as long as all the selected nodes are siblings (on the same hierarchical level).

section.title: Change DITA Map (For DITA Documents)
section.p:
To change the DITA Map that is associated with the current document, follow these steps:
With the document opened in , select the Choose DITA Map button on the DITA toolbar.
Choose the URL of the DITA Map that you want to be associated with the current document.
To see which DITA Map is currently associated with a document, select the Show Validation Results from the upper toolbar.
